name: Cavolo Nero (Black Kale)
properties: Part of Daily Dozen greens and cruciferous
benefits: Cavolo nero is a nutrient-dense Italian kale variety featured in traditional peasant soups like ribollita. As both a green and cruciferous vegetable, it provides double benefits for the Daily Dozen checklist. High in anti-inflammatory compounds and fiber.
amount: 1 bunch chopped. Part of Daily Dozen - 2 servings greens and 1 serving cruciferous vegetables daily

quotes: This cleaner, more modern version skips the cheese and bread in favour of superstars cavolo nero and cabbage.
